Room.Name: Lyanden Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the King's Road between Oceancrest and the eastern cities.
Room.LongDescription: The city of Oceancrest can be seen in the distance to the west. Small hills to the east hide the road, but the road is well traveled and looks safe. There are a several wagons on the road to the east. Open fields and groves of trees are to the north. On the south are rocky plains.
